articles.title: India April factory activity hits 4-month high on robust demand - Reuters India
articles.description: India's factory activity expanded at its quickest pace in four months in April, driven by solid growth in new orders and output, a private survey showed on Monday, signaling resilient demand and an encouraging outlook.
